sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Resume extends Component{ render(){ return (

Resume

john.steven.lloyd.jr@gmail.com

Professional Experience

Hilton | 2016 - Present

  • Sr. Director, User Experience & Design | 2018-Present
  • Design Director| 2016 - 2018
KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS
  • Lead team to launch redesigned experience for Hilton.com, including 18 brands and nearly 6000 properties
  • Lead team to launch multiple new features in the Hilton Honors apps including tools to explore the neighborhoods around properties, upgrade your room, share your digital key, control your television with your phone, and request a Lyft
  • Lead team to build and implement our internal design system, Fractal
  • Lead the design discipline for the team that won IHAF Inhouse Agency of the Year
  • Built and lead team to design Hilton’s Connected Room experience
  • Built and lead team to design Hilton’s enterprise software for on-property and call center team members
  • Built and lead UX&D team in Shanghai office to design experiences specific to our Chinese users
  • Built and lead experience design team to work on non-digital customer experience and innovation projects

ALSAC/St Jude Children’s Research Hospital | 2010-2016

  • Manager, User Experience Design | 2014 – 2016
  • Senior Specialist UI Developer, Interactive Product | 2010 – 2014
KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS
  • Lead the design and UI development teams through a full redesign and relaunch of stjude.org
  • Lead team in efforts to plan and art direct photoshoots for digital design efforts
  • Established the practice to start projects with collaborative workshops with internal business partners to gain alignment on problem statements, personas, and desired outcomes
  • Lead effort to have designers regularly spend time in our Enterprise Contact Center and at regional events to observe people using the software we built
  • Lead team to establish a design system for use across multiple digital properties to ensure consistency.
  • Defined a need on our group for additional user research and helped to recruit to hire the position.
  • Delivered increased revenue and engagement by proposing, designing and delivering mobile optimized pages on stjude.org for donations, volunteering, and signing up for communications.
  • Delivered Increased revenue by proposing, designing, and delivering new targeted donation forms.
  • Delivered Improved peer to peer fundraising experience by transitioning fundraising application to a new platform
  • Started and operated an internal usability lab

Hilton Worldwide

  • Web Designer | 2007 – 2010
KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS
  • Designed key reservation applications including Rapid Reservations, Floorplans, and Request Upon Arrival
  • Collaborated with two international offices to design a new site for the Japanese source market, hilton.co.jp
  • Designed, prototyped and launched a wedding portal for the Japanese source market
  • Designed and Launched 7 iPhone applications
  • Designed and launched mobile optimized websites for 13 hotel brands

Ducks Unlimited

  • Senior Designer | 2004 – 2007
KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS
  • Redesigned ducks.org
  • Worked with development staff to design templates for committee use to ensure brand consistency
  • Designed and launched e-commerce site for Hunt&Home brand
  • Designed and delivered multiply key fundraising development projects including capital campaign identity and collateral, annual reports, and advertisements
Education

Bachelor’s of Fine Arts with a concentration in Graphic Design

The University of Memphis

  • Graduated December 15, 2001 | GPA 3.12
Other Previous Employment
  • United Parcel Service - Package Handler | 1997 – 2002
  • Ducks Unlimited - Design Internship | 2001
  • Great Southern Corporation – Production Artist and Art Director | 2001 – 2004
); } } export default Resume;
